member.name: T:Company.Plugin.Classes.CompanySettings
member.summary: Settings for the Company plugin module which determine which pages are visible or not.

member.name: P:Company.Plugin.Classes.CompanySettings.ShowAbout
member.summary: Show the about page, provide information about the website and/or company operating it.

member.name: P:Company.Plugin.Classes.CompanySettings.ShowCareers
member.summary: Show the careers page, if the company has job openings, details can be shown on the careers page.

member.name: P:Company.Plugin.Classes.CompanySettings.ShowContact
member.summary: Show the contact us page, provide visitors with company contact details.

member.name: P:Company.Plugin.Classes.CompanySettings.ShowCookies
member.summary: Show the cookie page, provide visitors with details information regarding the site cookie policy.

member.name: P:Company.Plugin.Classes.CompanySettings.ShowDelivery
member.summary: Show the delivery page, detailing information on delivery options etc.

member.name: P:Company.Plugin.Classes.CompanySettings.ShowNewsletter
member.summary: Show the newsletter page, giving visitors details of any newsletters that may be provided.

member.name: P:Company.Plugin.Classes.CompanySettings.ShowPrivacy
member.summary: Show the privacy page, giving visitors details of the privacy policy.

member.name: P:Company.Plugin.Classes.CompanySettings.ShowReturns
member.summary: Show the returns page, if the company allows users to return items, details of the procedure/policy can be shown here.

member.name: P:Company.Plugin.Classes.CompanySettings.ShowTerms
member.summary: Show the Terms and conditions page, provide visitors with terms and conditions on using the website.

member.name: P:Company.Plugin.Classes.CompanySettings.ShowAffiliates
member.summary: Show the affiliates page, if an affiliate program is provided, details on its useage con be provided here.

member.name: T:Company.Plugin.Classes.CompanySitemapProvider
member.summary: Company sitemap provider, provides sitemap information for company information

member.name: M:Company.Plugin.Classes.CompanySitemapProvider.Items
member.summary: Retrieve a list of all company information that will be included in the sitemap

member.name: T:Company.Plugin.PluginInitialisation
member.summary: Implements IPlugin which allows the CompanyPlugin module to be loaded as a plugin module
